official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to revise the definition of the term "State" to authorize the inclusion of Guam in the programs authorized by that act.

summary.text: Revises the definition of the term "State" to authorize the inclusion of Guam in the programs authorized by the Public Health Service Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to revise the definition of the term "State" to authorize the inclusion of Guam in the programs authorized by that act.
